mission.title: Design That Lifts Causes, Not Just Brands.
mission.description: For years, we've powered business growth with design. Now, it's time to aim higher. The **Design for Good** Initiative is our pledge to empower nonprofits by making top-notch design radically accessible.
mission.highlight: Kicking off with room for only 10 visionary organizations. Expect front-of-the-line service, special rates, and a chance to shape this journey.
